variables.description: Whether to delete the network interface when the instance terminates. By                   default, this value is set to True.
variables.name: DeleteOnTermination

variables.description: The network interface's position in the attachment order. For example, the                   first attached network interface has a DeviceIndex of                   0.
variables.name: DeviceIndex

variables.description: The ID of the instance to which you will attach the ENI.
variables.name: InstanceId

variables.description: The ID of the ENI that you want to attach.
variables.name: NetworkInterfaceId
